<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Fuse Library Demo</title>
</head>
<body>
  <h1>Output from Fuse Library</h1>
  <div id="output"></div>

  <script type="module">
    import * as Fuse from './dist/fuse.mjs';

    // Example usage (you may need to adjust depending on the actual exports)
    const output = typeof Fuse.default === 'function'
      ? Fuse.default()               // If the library exports a default function
      : JSON.stringify(Fuse);        // If it's an object or class

    document.getElementById('output').textContent = output;
  </script>
</body>
</html>
